## Next Stop - BMFA

Memorable visits and educational experiences are top priorities for us here at the Brownsville Museum of Fine Art.   
Stop by today, we will be ready to serve you.

##### Museum Hours

* * *

Monday – Saturday: **10am – 4pm**

Wednesday: **10am – 8pm**

Sunday: **Closed**

##### Admission

* * *

Adults: **$5**

Children (6 -12): **$2.50**

Children (under 6): **Free**

Students, Seniors & Veterans: **$2.50**

Wednesdays After 5pm: **$2.50**

accessibility_text:
#### Accessibility

The Brownsville Museum of Fine Art is designed to be accessible for its variety of guests, where patrons are accommodated to the greatest degree possible so that their condition does not affect their experience.

#### The BMFA incorporates into its design easy interactivity with low physical effort.

ADA accessible parking with van access & ramp up to the sidewalk

## How To  
Visit, Enjoy,  
& Support  
The BMFA

## 01.

###  Visit Our Website Often 

Stop by online frequently. We'll have the latest information and schedules. 

## 02.

###  Gives Us A Call 

Due to Covid-19, call ahead with questions or to schedule a visit. [956-542-0941](tel:123-456-7890)

## 03.

###  Sign Up For Our Newsletter 

Register your email to get promos and the latest on upcoming events & exhibits. Click here to sign up.

## 04.

###  Get A Membership 

The best way to lend your support is by becoming a BMFA member. [Start Here.](https://bmfa.us/membership/)

## CURRENTLY AT YOUR MUSEUM OF FINE ART

49th INTERNATIONAL ART SHOW

The Brownsville Museum of Fine Art is proud to present the 49th International Art Show, a cherished tradition that continues to grow with each passing year. This prestigious exhibition brings together an inspiring collection of works by talented artists from across the United States and Canada, including a significant number of Mexican American artists. 

[ LEARN MORE ](/49th-international-art-show)
